info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 22 at 1:33AM EDT until August 23 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding.
* WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County.
* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 AM EDT Saturday, especially around the time of high tide.
* IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, water covers roads on Saint George Island, is in yards, and is approaching structures. To the east, inundation is occurring at multiple marinas off St. Mary's River, Smith Creek, and Jutland Creek.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Point Lookout is at 1:22 AM and 1:22 PM. The next high tide at Piney Point is at 2:00 AM and 2:34 PM. The next high tide at Coltons Point is at 2:36 AM and 3:10 PM.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

parameter.value: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM EDT SATURDAY
